reviewtext: Wasn't sure where I'd be sitting at a concert I spent a lot of money on tickets for, so I purchased these beforehand, figuring that even if I was sitting further than I'd like this would ensure I got a better view. These did the trick just fine. The strap isn't the most comfortable but it was easy to use and very sturdy. I like the case it came in as well. I don't use them often but I'm glad to have a pair laying around just in case, and the price was right.
